Text:
The app is free, and this is not the current version. Thus, not a very worthwhile upload on this site.

4.9 is available here from the developer: http://www.bresink.com/osx/TinkerTool.html

To emphasize what pryingeyes has correctly said, there is actually no point uploading FREE software easily available from a number of sources, especially if one of those sources is the DEVELOPER himself.

a big LOL 
thank you guys !!!

In actual fact I found the file to be "damaged" my fault for messing with the contents, the app doesn't like you changing the apps main icon.
I'll make a torrent for the main DMG if you want it, post a comment if you want it or go to  http://www.bresink.com/osx/TinkerTool.html
And get the latest.
